history.proof: intros. unfold binomial. induction H as [| n' IHn']. - simpl. reflexivity. - rewrite binomial_n0. sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: intros fact_neq_0 n H. unfold binomial. intros Hn. induction H as [| n' IHn']. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite binomial_n0. rewrite binomial_n0. rewrite IHn'. rewrite IHn'. reflexivity.
